level.heading: Establishment of the Department of Small and Local Business Development.

level.text: Pursuant to ยง 1-204.04(b), there is established, as a subordinate agency, in the Executive Branch of the government of the District of Columbia, the Department of Small and Local Business Development.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2311 of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-33, see notes following ยง 2-218.01.
